question: Which Indian-origin personality has been crowned Miss England 2019?
explanation: A 23-year-old Indian-origin doctor, Bhasha Mukherjee has been crowned Miss England after fending off competition from dozens of other models. She holds two different medical degrees & has an IQ of 146, which makes her officially a \'genius\'. Mukherjee speaks five languages - English, Bengali, Hindi, German and French  -and has a Bachelor\'s degree in medicine and surgery from the University of Nottingham. As winner of Miss England, she will be entered into the Miss World contest and will also bag a holiday to Mauritius.
